_sText:
Welcome to "speedcastle_texture_LL_2008"

Map created By El_Mexicano


This is an "AIM" map , with 14 slots in each team, 28 slots 

Which means that there is no aim , the only aim is to kill all players of the other team!
It's a "FUN" map , that's why all the creation of this map was based on the FUN side 
of the map , and that's why i've used the grey & orange textures like the ones you 
can find in "fy_blazin" or " texture_city " map (for those who know them)

it's the knass_speedcastle i already modified , but that version , i added some new feature ( new corridor, new stairs ) and a really nice skybox
hop you'll enjoy

The .BSP file makes 5 MO.

Big thanks to the Los Latinos production for their help & all the Los latinos team for the help they gave me 

=> Latinos internet page  :  http://www.loslatinos.fr
=> Los Latinos server  :  91.121.169.49:27015  FUN FUN FUN


Thanks  :
-Thanks to the creator of the "knass_speedcastle" map , in which map i found some inspiration
for my map


INSTAllation : only extract the .RAR into you folder CSTRIKE  .......


El_mexicano
(ps: if you encounter any problems with the map , please contact us at 
     http://www.loslatinos.fr/, thank you ).
